definition: special appointment/special correspondent/task force/sb dispatched on a mission
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie
special correspondent/sb dispatched on a mission/special commissioner

sentences.english: He was buried in the floor of the Mission San Carlos Church.
sentences.chinese: 他在该特派团圣卡洛斯教堂地板埋所有总部。

sentences.english: Parties concerned should continue to support the work of UNMIK.
sentences.chinese: 有关各方应继续支持联科特派团开展工作。

sentences.english: Your excellency, special agent Fleury of the Federal Bureau of Investigation and his colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 阁下，这是美国联邦调查局特派员弗勒里和他的同僚。

sentences.english: Ombudsman found inquire after one hour, one is bear said doctors saved him.
sentences.chinese: 特派员发现苏乙后进行询问，苏乙称是熊医生救了他。

sentences.english: Resident audit officers shall, according to the authorization of audit institutions, conduct audit work in accordance with the law.
sentences.chinese: 审计特派员根据审计机关的授权，依法进行审计工作。

sentences.english: She works for America's Federal Bureau of Investigation.
sentences.chinese: 阁下，美国联邦调查局特派员弗勒里和他的同僚。

sentences.english: Special teams will be sent occasionally to patrol at major oil and chemical ports.
sentences.chinese: 政府将不定期地安排特派团巡视主要的石油化学港口。

sentences.english: The following case is a typical example of the Ombudsman's work.
sentences.chinese: 下述事件是司法特派员工作的一个典型例子。

sentences.english: Paul, a servant of Jesus Christ, called to be an apostle, separated unto the gospel of God.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣基督的仆人保罗，奉召为使徒，特派传神的福音。

sentences.english: We are going to put Comrade Zhuang in for the post of special correspondent.
sentences.chinese: 他们是调查这类事情的特派记者。

sentences.english: Dai Jinhua rate team first river crossing, matt to send some difficulty there.
sentences.chinese: 戴金花率队先行渡河，马特派员那里有些困难。

sentences.english: You must get prepared to receive the special commissioners this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 你们要做好下午迎接特派员的准备工作。

sentences.english: Paul, a servant of Christ Jesus, called to be an apostle, set apart for the gospel of God.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣基督的仆人保罗，奉召为使徒，特派传神的福音。

sentences.english: The Ombudsman is not subject to political pressure.
sentences.chinese: 司法特派员不受政治压力的影响。

sentences.english: FC2 will feature the much requested Mission Planner interface.
sentences.chinese: FC2的将有很大的要求特派团的规划接口。

sentences.english: The national palace and the headquarters of the United Nations mission in Haiti also collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 海地总统府和联合国海地特派团总部都因强震倒塌。
